name: hanzo-ai
description: Advanced AI development server with comprehensive tools for file operations, code analysis, and development workflows
long_description: Hanzo AI provides 36 professional UNIX-style tools including file system operations, code search with AST awareness, shell command execution, process management, and more. Features a mode system with 100 programmer personalities for customizing tool configurations and supports dynamic MCP server orchestration.

tools.name: multi_edit
tools.description: Make multiple edits to a single file

tools.name: symbols
tools.description: Code symbols search with AST awareness (includes ast action)

tools.name: agent
tools.description: Delegate tasks to AI agents for concurrent execution

tools.name: todo
tools.description: Manage todo lists for tracking tasks

tools.name: batch
tools.description: Execute multiple tool calls in sequence

tools.name: mode
tools.description: Manage development modes with 100 programmer personalities

tools.name: critic
tools.description: Critical code review and quality enforcement

tools.name: rules
tools.description: Read project preferences and coding rules

disable_write_tools.title: Disable Write Tools
disable_write_tools.description: Disable all file write operations for safety

enable_agent_tool.title: Enable Agent Tool
enable_agent_tool.description: Enable the agent delegation tool (requires API key)

hanzo_mode.title: Development Mode
hanzo_mode.description: Choose a programmer personality mode (e.g., guido, linus, minimal, fullstack)

hanzo_api_key.title: Hanzo API Key (Optional)
hanzo_api_key.description: Your Hanzo API key for AI features (automatically enables agent tools). Not required to use the extension.

disable_hanzo_login.title: Disable Login Prompts
disable_hanzo_login.description: Disable prompts to login to Hanzo (use extension without account)
